entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this evening and ending before morning. Snow mixed with rain overnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight then northwest 40 gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 10 except near minus 16 in low lying inland areas.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 10 except near minus 16 in low lying inland areas. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 31 January 2023
